archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Security Architecture Review Process (SAR2)
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Security Architecture Review Process (SAR2) begins with a self-assessment consisting of 28 questions which are drilling down into the questions we ask in a SAR1 review. The process requires the architect to call for a review with the enterprise security architecture team. The review is walking through the questions, looking at evidence and both verifying information and providing an opportunity for active feedback between the Enterprise Security Architecture Team and the Architect.
The review results in a score being provided and also a published document containing both scoring and the Enterprise Security Architecture Team observations.
